title: I got a Google 4a today, and am waiting for software update.
content:
When does the update pass that allows me to remove day and date from the top of my home screen? Google can allow me to use 100% of my home screen instead of 80% of it.

Only reason I regret the purchase. Pixel 2 didn't have this problem.

Devs can trust me to place a widget there if I want day and date to show instead of forcing an unmovable widget onto my home screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
